data.question: What is the chemical formula of the metal-organic framework discussed?
At what temperature does the Co-MOF exhibit magnetic ordering?
What is the crystal system of the Co-MOF?
Is the Co-MOF stable in air?
What method was used to measure the low field magnetic properties of the Co-MOF?
Does the Co-MOF obey the Curie-Weiss law above 20 K?
What is the effect of applying a magnetic field along [101] on the electric polarization of Co-MOF?
data.answer: A sharp change in electric polarization occurs when the magnetic field reaches a critical value.

data.question: Can the direction of electric polarization in Co-MOF be switched?
data.answer: Yes, depending on the history of the previous two magnetic-field pulses.

data.question: What is the final product of thermal decomposition of Co-MOF at 873 K?
data.answer: A combination of CoO and Co

data.question: Is the magnetization of Co-MOF along [010] independent of the field used to cool it?
What is the space group of Co-MOF?
Does the electric polarization of Co-MOF exhibit a memory effect?
What is the critical magnetic field for a sharp decrease in electric polarization at 2.8 K?
What mechanism is proposed for multiferroic behavior in Co-MOF?
Is the Co-MOF compound a type II multiferroic material?
What is the role of the MA cations in the structure of Co-MOF?
data.answer: They occupy pseudo cubooctahedral cavities and are linked to formate ligands through hydrogen bonds.

data.question: Does the Co-MOF structure support a net electric polarization at room temperature?
data.answer: No, the electric dipoles of different canted bonds cancel each other out.

data.question: What is the effect of a magnetic-field-induced change in magnetic ordering on ferroelectricity in Co-MOF?
data.answer: It alters ferroelectricity by changing spatial-inversion symmetry breaking.

data.question: What is the effective magnetic moment of the Co2+ ion in Co-MOF?
data.answer: Higher than the spin-only value due to a small unquenched orbital component.

data.question: Is the magnetic switching in Co-MOF likely due to traditional domain switching?
data.answer: No, it is unlikely due to traditional domain switching.
